aic2024.user

Interface UnitController


  • public interface UnitController
    Each unit has associated an instance of this class. It allows the unit to interact with the environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canEnlistAstronaut(Direction dir, int oxygen, CarePackage carePackage)
      Returns if this unit can enlist an astronaut at a given direction, with a given quantity of oxygen, and equipped with a given carePackage (null if no care package).
      boolean canPerformAction(ActionType action, Direction dir, int value)
      Returns if a given action can be performed following the given direction with a particular numerical value (only used for JUMP action).
      boolean canSenseLocation(Location loc)
      Returns if the unit can sense target location.
      void cleanBroadcastBuffer()
      Erases all elements from the broadcast buffer.

      Draws a segment on the map between a given pair of locations and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates).

      Attempts to enlist an astronaut at a given direction, with a given quantity of oxygen, and equipped with a given carePackage (null if no care package).

      Erases the first n elements from the broadcast buffer.

      • canSenseLocation

        boolean canSenseLocation(Location loc)
        Returns if the unit can sense target location. It returns true if and only if the location is on the map, inside the unit's vision range, and if it has enough illumination. It receives a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.
        Returns:
        if the unit can sense target location.

      • isOutOfMap

        boolean isOutOfMap(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location is outside the map. There is a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if the given location is outside the map.

      • senseObjectAtLocation

        MapObject senseObjectAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the object at a given location. It prioritizes neutral buildings, then if the tile is terraformed, then if the tile is domed, and lastly the tile type. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the object at a given location.

      • senseObjects

        Location[] senseObjects(MapObject mapObject,
                        float radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with all visible objects inside the map and inside a given radius. It receives a penalty if the given radius is negative. If the object is null, it returns all visible tiles. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        mapObject - Given object
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with all visible objects inside the map and inside a given radius.

      • senseAstronaut

        AstronautInfo senseAstronaut(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the astronaut at a given location. It returns null if there is no astronaut. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the astronaut at a given location.

      • senseStructure

        StructureInfo senseStructure(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the structure at a given location. It returns null if there is no structure. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the structure at a given location.

      • senseAstronauts

        AstronautInfo[] senseAstronauts(float radiusSquared,
                                Team team)
        Returns an array with all other astronauts of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the team is null, it returns the astronauts of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other astronauts of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it.

      • senseStructures

        StructureInfo[] senseStructures(float radiusSquared,
                                Team team)
        Returns an array with all other structures of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the team is null, it returns the structures of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other structures of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it.

      • isTerraformed

        boolean isTerraformed(Location loc)
        Returns true if the location is terraformed. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if the location is terraformed.

      • isDomed

        boolean isDomed(Location loc)
        Returns true if the location is covered by a Dome. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if the location is covered by a Dome.

      • senseCarePackage

        CarePackage senseCarePackage(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the care package at a given location (null if none). There is a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed. It costs 10 energy
        Parameters:
        loc - given location.
        Returns:
        the information of the care package at a given location.

      • senseCarePackages

        CarePackageInfo[] senseCarePackages(float radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with the information of all care packages that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all care packages that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it.

      • senseTileType

        TileType senseTileType(Location loc)
        Returns the tile type (LAND, WATER or HOT_ZONE) at a given location. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the tile type at a given location.

      • killSelf

        void killSelf()
        This method kills this unit. It costs 1 energy.

      • canPerformAction

        boolean canPerformAction(ActionType action,
                         Direction dir,
                         int value)
        Returns if a given action can be performed following the given direction with a particular numerical value (only used for JUMP action). Note that of these actions may not use both parameters (see Game Description). For example, MOVE only uses the direction, and therefore the numerical value is ignored. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        action - Action type.
        dir - Given direction (not used by BROADCAST action).
        value - Given numerical value (only used by JUMP action).
        Returns:
        if a given action can be performed following the given direction with a particular numerical value. Here's a list of when actions can be performed: JUMP: Value is between 1 and MAX_JUMP, the given direction is either NORTH, SOUTH, EAST or WEST and the resulting location is accessible. MOVE: The unit's movement cooldown is less than 1 and the resulting location is accessible. SABOTAGE: The resulting location contains either a structure (or a dome or a hyperjump) or an astronaut TERRAFORM: The resulting location is accessible, can be terraformed and is not yet terraformed. BUILD_SETTLEMENT: The astronaut has a SETTLEMENT package and the resulting location is passable and not occupied by a unit. BUILD_HYPERJUMP: The astronaut has a HYPERJUMP package and the resulting location is passable and does not contain another structure. BUILD_DOME:The astronaut has a DOME package and the resulting location is passable and does not contain another structure. RETRIEVE: The resulting location contains a package. BROADCAST: Always true. TRANSFER_OXYGEN: The resulting location contains a unit (either astronaut or non-neutral structure).

      • performAction

        void performAction(ActionType action,
                   Direction dir,
                   int value)
        Performs a given action following the given direction with a particular numerical value. There is a penalty if the given action cannot be performed. Read canPerformAction for more information. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        action - Action type.
        dir - Given direction.
        value - Given numerical value.

      • canEnlistAstronaut

        boolean canEnlistAstronaut(Direction dir,
                           int oxygen,
                           CarePackage carePackage)
        Returns if this unit can enlist an astronaut at a given direction, with a given quantity of oxygen, and equipped with a given carePackage (null if no care package). It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - Given direction
        oxygen - Given oxygen
        carePackage - Given care Package
        Returns:
        if this unit can build a unit of a given type at a given direction.

      • enlistAstronaut

        void enlistAstronaut(Direction dir,
                     int oxygen,
                     CarePackage carePackage)
        Attempts to enlist an astronaut at a given direction, with a given quantity of oxygen, and equipped with a given carePackage (null if no care package). There is a penalty if this action cannot be performed. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - Given direction
        oxygen - Given oxygen
        carePackage - Given care Package

      • pollBroadcast

        BroadcastInfo pollBroadcast()
        Returns the front element of the broadcast buffer and removes that element from the buffer. It returns null if empty. It costs 10 energy.
        Returns:
        the front element of the broadcast buffer and removes that element from the buffer.

      • cleanBroadcastBuffer

        void cleanBroadcastBuffer()
        Erases all elements from the broadcast buffer. It costs 10 energy.

      • eraseBroadcastBuffer

        void eraseBroadcastBuffer(int n)
        Erases the first n elements from the broadcast buffer. There is a penalty if n is negative. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of elements to be erased.

      • getRound

        int getRound()
        Returns current game round. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        current game round.

        Returns the energy used by this unit so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

        Returns the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

      • println

        void println(java.lang.Object o)
        Prints an object o for debug purposes. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        o - given object.

      • drawPointDebug

        void drawPointDebug(Location loc,
                    int r,
                    int g,
                    int b)
        Draws a point on the map at a given location and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if the location is null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • drawLineDebug

        void drawLineDebug(Location fromLoc,
                   Location toLoc,
                   int r,
                   int g,
                   int b)
        Draws a segment on the map between a given pair of locations and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if any of the location are null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        fromLoc - First location.
        toLoc - Second location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • getRandomDouble

        double getRandomDouble()
        Returns a randomly generated double. If this is the only random method used by both teams, all of their games with a fixed seed are identical. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        a randomly generated double.

      • yield

        void yield()
        Halts this unit's execution until the next round. It costs 1 energy.
